import React from "react"; import { Col } from "react-flexbox-grid"; function GitHubCard({ repo }) { return (
{ var win = window.open(repo.node.url, "_blank"); win.focus(); }} >

{repo.node.name}

{repo.node.description}

{repo.node.primaryLanguage.name}

{repo.node.forkCount}

{repo.node.stargazers.totalCount}

{repo.node.diskUsage} KB

); } export default GitHubCard;
